RankedSetSampling provides a way for researchers to easily implement Ranked Set Sampling in practice.

## Installation

Use the following code to install this package:

```{r eval=F}
if(!require("remotes")) install.packages("remotes") 
remotes::install_github("biometryhub/RankedSetSampling", upgrade = FALSE)
```
